alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 8:41PM MST until December 06 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in eastern Juab and Millard Counties, and 2 to 6 inches in the Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs, and central Utah Mountains. * WHERE...Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties and Central Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on I- 15 from Nephi south, I-70 near Cove Fort, and mountain routes through the central mountains and Wasatch Plateau.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
